title: Creative Coding With Python, Py5, and py5pjs

date: 2024-07-28T11:12:00
---
[Alexandre B A Villares](https://abav.lugaralgum.com/) gave a [tutorial](https://youtu.be/h5t522FnAMc) at PyCon US 2024, showing how Python can be used to produce art and express creativity.

Alexandre has been publishing [a sketch a day](https://abav.lugaralgum.com/sketch-a-day/) for *years* - so many cool stuff there!

I worked through the recorded tutorial: https://github.com/itamaro/pyp5js-tutorial

My "lovely" creations:
